title: [feature request] Computing var/stddev and mean at the same time
body_html: The current variance kernels compute mean at the same time. Many times we want both statistics together, so it seems reasonable to have a kwarg/function that allows us to get both values without launching an extra kernel.
body_text: The current variance kernels compute mean at the same time. Many times we want both statistics together, so it seems reasonable to have a kwarg/function that allows us to get both values without launching an extra kernel.
